content:
1. Led Frontend Development for Major Clients: Successfully led the frontend team in delivering secure and scalable UI solutions for high-profile clients like HDFC Bank and Bank of Baroda, ensuring cross-browser compatibility, accessibility, and responsive design.
  2. Improved Performance and Efficiency: Refactored legacy codebases to use modern React patterns and Redux Toolkit, which significantly improved application performance and maintainabilityâ€”reducing load times and simplifying the development workflow.
  3. End-to-End Project Ownership: Took ownership of complete frontend modules, from requirement gathering to deployment. My work contributed to on-time project delivery and received appreciation from both clients and management.
